DOC.brief_summary: To date , data literature regard change intracuff pressure prolong surgical procedure . It possible pressure increase time related gas expansion equilibration body temperature . If case , patient may risk tracheal damage . This prospective study evaluate change intracuff pressure time prolonged surgical procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Intracuff Pressure Cuffed Endotracheal Tube During Prolonged Surgical Procedures .
DOC.criteria: Patients cuff endotracheal tube use surgical procedure 4 hour .
